name: Fritz demo
description:
little test of  a mechanic

the bolt of lightning will move in a straight line while slowly losing momentum. WASD will change the direction it moves in. If the bolt runs into a conductive material, it will regain momentum and add the object to a chain. when momentum runs out or the bolt touches an obstacle, the chain will activate and each object will get zapped.

cool idea would be for different objects to effect the bolt when it passes through, like one could increase the speed
